data.name: My Teacher Hilda: Nora Finds New Friends
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

It's Nora's first day at the Bumble Bee Academy daycare. She has been crying on the way to school. Things change as soon as she meets her class. "Nora Finds New Friends" is the first season (comprising three episodes) of the series "My Teacher Hilda". Playing is an important part of children's learning and development. Appropriate for the kids between 3 and 8 years of age, the series "My Teacher Hilda" focuses on play based early learning. The children would have opportunity to learn along with the lovable animal characters in the class while participating in their fun activities.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
